content: I'm good to go!
Then, <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, it's your turn to draw a card from the remaining ones.
And finally, before you draw, I'll add a <style=Highlight>Wildcard</style> to the deck! If you draw it at any time, you win.
Draw again!

Let's see...
{A摊手}It's <style=Highlight>{玩家选择值}</style>, but it's not between <style=Highlight>{NPC选择值1}</style> and <style=Highlight>{NPC选择值2}</style>...
Sorry, but I win this time.

The rules of this game are a bit complicated.
Do you want me to go over them?
Or do you already know how to play?
If the number you draw falls <style=Highlight>between</style> the two numbers I drew, then you win.
If you think your chances of winning are too low from the start, you have up to <style=Highlight>two</style> chances to make me redraw before you draw.
I still don't get it. Explain again!
Got it! Let's begin!

Alright, I'll draw my numbers first. Let's see... I got <style=SizeBig><style=Highlight>{NPC选择值1}</style> and <style=Highlight>{NPC选择值2}</style></style>. <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, do you want to draw now?
Yes! Let's do it!
I want you to redraw!
Okay, I'll put this back and draw again.
Let's see... I got <style=SizeBig><style=Highlight>{NPC选择值1}</style> and <style=Highlight>{NPC选择值2}</style></style>. <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, are you ready to draw now?
Eyes closed, I'm drawing now!
Eyes closed, prayer done, and time to draw!

Let's see...
{A拍手}It's <style=Highlight>{玩家选择值}</style>, and it's indeed between <style=Highlight>{NPC选择值1}</style> and <style=Highlight>{NPC选择值2}</style>!
<style=SizeBig>Congratulations, you win!</style>
I'd like to know the rules.
Here, I have <style=Highlight>number cards</style> from <style=Highlight>1</style> to <style=Highlight>9</style>. I'll draw two and let you know the numbers.
Alright, I'll put them back again. One last redraw!
Let's see... I got <style=SizeBig><style=Highlight>{NPC选择值1}</style> and <style=Highlight>{NPC选择值2}</style></style> this time. Now it's your turn, <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>!

Let's see...
{A拍手}What?! It's the <style=Highlight>Wildcard</style>?!
<style=SizeBig>You win! So lucky!</style>
